resources.string:
Pinapple is a tropical fruit which is not only tasty but /n offers a myriad list of health benefits. Whether you /n are using it as meat tenderizer, a garnish for a cocktail/n or a addition to a salad or main dish, it is cost effective way to /n get your Vitamin C. Peeling a pineapple is a tough task because of/n its thick skin, however, you can follow these steps to remove the skin easily./n Step 1: Set the pineapple on the cutting board and slice off the top green crown area./n
Step 2: Use a sharp knife, slice through the outside peel from top to bottom. /n Make sure you are not chopping off the yellow flesh /n with the peel./n
Step 3: Cut the eyes or spots from the pineapple./n
Step 4: Now, chop pineapple into desired pieces.
